name: Platform (fullynikahh)
description:
A Platform 2d game i am trying to make. It´s not complete and it only have 2 levels.

I don't have much time anyway. 

The animations may be bad, and it has some bugs. 

I am sorry. 

left = Left

Right = Right 

A = Jump

B = N/D

Up= Up the ladder

Down = Down the ladder
